English: Unbelievable.
Chinese: ……到此為止了呢。
German: Unglaublich.

English:
You've really come along, Nokia Shiramine,
Greymon, Garurumon.
Chinese:
真是了不起的成長，白峰諾奇雅。
以及暴龍獸、加魯魯獸。
Korean:
훌륭한 성장이야, 시라미네 노키아.
그리고 그레이몬, 가루몬
German:
Ihr habt euch wirklich weiterentwickelt, Nokia
Shiramine, Greymon, Garurumon.

English: Thank you, but you went easy on us, right?
Chinese:
……謝謝妳。
妳是刻意把功勞讓給我們的吧？
German:
Vielen Dank. Aber ihr habt es uns leicht gemacht,
oder?

English: Hehe, I wonder.
Chinese: 呵呵……妳說呢？　到底是不是呢？
German: Hehe, wer weiß.

English:
I'm sure lending you our tough lackey is one of
the reasons why we lost.
Chinese:
但把強大的手下借給你們，
這份大意的確是敗因之一呢。
Korean:
강력한 부하를 빌려주고 만 자만이 패인 중 하나가 된 것은
틀림없겠지만
German:
Einer der Gründe, warum wir verloren haben,
war sicher, dass wir euch unseren fiesen Helfer
ausgeliehen haben.

English: Bad lackey! Hehehe.
Chinese: 還真是請了個難纏的手下呢……呵呵呵。
German: Böser Helfer! Hehehe.

English: Greymon... Garurumon... You were awesome!
Chinese:
暴龍獸……加魯魯獸啊……
變得真是厲害呢。
German: Greymon ... Garurumon ... Ihr wart fantastisch!

English:
I'm happy, but also a little sad. I liked you how
you were before.
Chinese:
雖然很高興，但總覺得有點寂寞呢。
畢竟我好喜歡你們之前的樣子──
Korean:
기쁘지만 어쩐지 좀 쓸쓸한걸.
예전 모습도 정말 좋았으니까――
German:
Ich bin glücklich, aber auch etwas traurig.
Ich mochte euch so, wie ihr wart.

English: Really? In that case...
Chinese: 是嗎？　既然諾奇雅這麼說……
German: Wirklich? Na, wenn das so ist ...

English: Ah! You changed back!
Chinese: 啊！　原本的樣子──
German: Ah! Ihr habt die Verwandlung rückgängig gemacht!

English:
That form takes a lot of energy. This one's much
more comfortable.
Chinese: 那個狀態很耗能量，這樣子比較輕鬆喔。
Korean: 그 모습은 에너지를 많이 쓰니까 이쪽이 편한걸
German:
Die andere Form verbraucht viel Energie. Diese ist
viel bequemer.

English:
Yeah! And it would be too dangerous to play with
you like that.
Chinese: 嗯！　而且，那樣子要跟諾奇雅玩也很危險呢。
Korean: 응! 게다가 노키아와 놀 때 그 모습이면 위험하니까
German:
Ja! Und es wäre zu gefährlich, so mit euch zu
spielen.

English:
Hahaha... Yeah, if you jumped up on me like you
were just now, you'd squash me flat as a pancake.
Chinese:
啊哈哈……的確，要是你們用那樣子跑過來，
就算這是化身，但我的性感可愛身體也會粉碎呢。
Korean:
아하하… 확실히 그런 모습으로 달려들면
나의 에로귀염보디가 분쇄되겠네
German:
Hahaha ... Ja, wenn du in der Form auf mich
drauf gesprungen wärst, wäre ich jetzt platt
wie eine Flunder.

English: Thank you, Agumon, Gabumon.
Chinese: ……謝謝你們，亞古獸、加布獸。
German: Danke, Agumon, Gabumon.

English:
You changed back so easily. It took us a lot of
training before we mastered that skill.
Chinese:
居然這麼簡單就變回原本的樣貌──
就算是我們，也需要相當程度的鍛鍊才做到……
Korean:
그렇게 쉽게 원래 모습으로 돌아갈 수 있다니――
우리들조차 그 기술을 익히기 위해 상당한 단련이 필요했는데…
German:
Ihr habt euch so problemlos zurückverwandelt. Wir
mussten lange trainieren, um das zu können.

English: You might Digivolve into great Digimon one day.
Chinese: 說不定你們有一天，能進化成非常偉大的數碼寶貝呢。
Korean:
너희들은 언젠가 굉장히 위대한 디지몬으로 진화할지도
모르겠네
German:
Eines Tages werdet ihr vielleicht zu richtig
tollen Digimon.

English:
Just like our teacher, Gankoomon.
Don't you think so, Blanc?
Chinese:
就像我們的師父，頑固獸那樣……
怎麼樣，妳也這麼覺得吧？　雪白？
Korean:
그래, 마치 우리들의 스승, 간쿠몬처럼…
저기, 그렇게 생각하지 않아? 블랑?
German:
Genau wie unser Lehrer, Gankoomon.
Meinst du nicht, Blanc?

English: Huh? Blanc?
Chinese: ……嗯？　雪白？
German: Hm? Blanc?

English: So...frustrating...
German: So ... frustrierend ...

English: Hey...Blanc? What's wrong?!
German: He ... Blanc? Was ist los?!

English: ARGH! IT'S SO FRUSTRATING!!!
Chinese:
嗚啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！
不甘心不甘心不甘心不甘心─────！！！！！
German: ARGH! ES IST SO FRUSTRIEREND!!!

English: HOW COULD WE LOSE?!
Chinese: 我們怎麼可能會輸啊──────！！！
German: WIE KONNTEN WIR NUR VERLIEREN?!

English: Blanc?! Are you okay?!
Chinese: 嗚啊啊！？　雪、雪白！？
German: Blanc?! Alles klar?!

English: Blanc, calm down!
Chinese: 雪白，冷靜啊！
German: Blanc, beruhige dich!

English:
The goal of today's battle was to boost their
confidence. We discussed this!
Chinese:
今天的戰鬥，目的是要讓這些孩子們建立自信。
我們不是這樣打算的嗎！？
Korean:
오늘 배틀은 저 애들에게 자신감을 붙여주는게
목적이라고 미리 말했었잖아!?
German:
Das Ziel des heutigen Kampfs war es, ihr
Selbstbewusstsein zu steigern. Das haben wir
doch besprochen!

English: I know... I know, but...!
Chinese: 我知道……我也知道啊……！
German: Ich weiß ... Ich weiß, aber ...!

English:
But it's so frustrating that we lost, even though
we gave it everything we've got!
Chinese:
可是，拿出真本事卻輸掉，
果然還是很不甘心啊……！！！
Korean:
하지만 진심으로 싸워도 지다니 역시
분해서 견딜 수가 없어요……!!!
German:
Aber es ist so frustrierend, dass wir verloren
haben, obwohl wir alles gegeben haben!

English: Hey, how about another round?! What do you say?!
Chinese:
呵呵，呵哈哈哈哈！
我說你們啊，再來一次吧！　再來比一次吧！
Korean:
우후, 우후후후후!
이봐 당신들, 다시 한번!  다시 한번 승부하자!
German:
He, wie wäre es mit einer weiteren Runde?! Was
meint ihr?!

English:
I'm so pumped right now.
One fight just isn't enough!
Chinese:
這股靈魂的興奮，只戰鬥個一兩次
是無法停止的啊啊啊啊啊─────！！！
Korean:
이 혼의 고양감, 한 번이나 두 번의 싸움으로는
가라앉힐 수 없어요오오오오―――――――!
German:
Ich bin gerade so aufgekratzt!
Ein Kampf allein ist einfach nicht genug!

English: Whooooaaaa!
Chinese: 嗚哦哦哦哦哦─────！！！
German: Boooaaahhh!

English: Argh!
Chinese: 呀啊啊啊───！！
German: Argh!

English: Eek!
German: Aaah!

English: Don't worry about her. She always gets like this.
Chinese:
啊啊，雪白真是的！！
每次都會變成這樣！
Korean:
아아, 정말. 블랑도 참!!
언제나 이렇다니까!
German:
Macht euch keine Sorgen wegen ihr. Sie ist
immer so.

English:
She just can't control her fighting instinct after
an exhilarating battle.
Chinese:
只要比完一場精彩比賽，
就會太過興奮，克制不住戰鬥本能了。
Korean:
멋진 승부 후에는 흥분해서 전투본능을
가라앉히지 못한단 말이지~?
German:
Nach einem aufregenden Kampf kriegt sie ihren
Kampfinstinkt einfach nicht unter Kontrolle.

English: Don't worry! I'll handle her!
Chinese:
你們安心吧！
雪白就由我這姊姊來負責阻止她！
Korean:
안심하도록 해!
블랑은 언니인 내가 책임지고 막아줄게!
German: Keine Bange! Ich kümmere mich um sie!

English: But how will you do it by yourself?!
Chinese: 但、但是，妳一個人要怎麼做……！？
German: Aber wie schaffst du das allein?

English:
There's only one thing that can stop one of my
sister's rampages!
Chinese: 能夠阻止妹妹失控的……就只有一個辦法！
Korean: 동생의 폭주를 막을 수 있는 건… 단 한 가지야!
German:
Es gibt nur eins, was so einen Anfall meiner
Schwester beenden kann!

English: Listen, Blanc! A lullaby from Gankoomon!
Chinese:
雪白，聽我這邊！
頑固獸師父直傳……「老爸搖籃曲」！！！！！
Korean:
들어봐, 블랑!
간쿠몬 사부에게 직접 전수받은……「친부의 자장가」!!!!!
German: Hör mal, Blanc! Ein Schlaflied von Gankoomon!

English: Hushabye, hushabye!
Chinese: 嗯哼……好～孩子快點睡，快～一～點～睡～
German: Lalelu ...

English: Ah! That song!
Chinese: 嗚、嗚嗚……！　這、這首歌是……！！
German: Ah! Das Lied!

English: My good student, sleep!
Chinese: 徒弟～是～好孩子～快～一點睡吧～
German: Meine liebe Schülerin, schlaf!

English:
After a long day of training, it's time to rest!
Quake, blast, fire, father!
Chinese:
修行之後～要好～好～休～息～
地～震，閃電，火～災，老～爸～
German:
Nach einem langen Trainingstag wird es Zeit,
dich auszuruhen. Beben! Explosion! Knall! Vater!

English:
Drinking after practice!
Shall I flip the table for you?
Chinese:
修行～之後～要～喝酒～
就讓你～見識下～翻桌～吧～
Korean:
수행~후~에는 한잔 마시고~♪
밥~상~ 뒤집어~ 보실까~♪
German:
Nach dem Training wird getrunken!
Soll ich den Tisch für dich werfen?

English: Wow! That's some lullaby!
Chinese:
嗚嗚……好有味道……！
這首歌，莫名的有味道啊……！
Korean: 우우… 썰렁해…! 뭔가 묘하게 썰렁해, 저 노래…!
German: Wow, was für ein Schlaflied!

English: Urgh...urgh...
Chinese: 啊嗯……姐、姐──
German: Argh ... argh ...

English: What happens to little girls who don't sleep?
Chinese: 不睡覺的～小孩子～
German:
Was passiert mit kleinen Mädchen, die nicht
schlafen?

English: Tekken Seisai!
German: Tekken Seisai!

English: Oh?!
German: Ach?!

English: She actually hit her?!
Chinese: 結、結果打下去了────！！？？
German: Sie hat sie tatsächlich geschlagen?!

English: Zzzz... Zzzz...
Chinese: 啊嗯啊嗯～……唔……
German: Zzzz ... zzzz ...

English: She's back to normal!
Chinese: 啊，變回本來的樣子了！
German: Sie ist wieder normal!

English:
Zzzz... Noir...
Teacher... Hackmon... Urgh... Zzzz...
Chinese:
啊嗯啊嗯……姊姊……
師傅……哈克獸……呼呼。
EnglishCensored:
Zzzz... Ciel...
Teacher... Hackmon... Urgh... Zzzz...
German:
Zzzz ... Ciel ...
Lehrer ... Hackmon ... Argh ... Zzzz ...

English:
And she's sleeping so peacefully.
That lullaby was amazing!
Chinese:
而且看起來睡得好好喔……
搖籃曲好厲害喔！
Korean:
게다가 굉장히 기분 좋게 자고 있어….
굉장하구나! 자장가라는 건!
German:
Und sie schläft so friedlich.
Das Schlaflied war der Hammer!

English: I'm not sure if it was the song or the punch...
Chinese:
嗯……這該算搖籃曲很厲害呢～
還是拳頭很厲害呢……
Korean:
우음, 지금은 자장가가 굉장한 거라고 해야 할까~
주먹이 굉장하다고 해야 할까…
German:
Ich bin mir nicht sicher, ob es das Lied oder
der Hieb war ...

English: Don't worry. That lullaby soothes pain.
Chinese:
你們安心吧，
這首搖籃曲也有紓解疼痛的效果。
Korean:
안심해도 돼.
이 자장가에는 통증을 진정시키는 효과도 있어
German: Keine Bange. Das Schlaflied lindert Schmerzen.

English:
Kind words and the occasional punch...
That's how we show love in Gankoomon's family!
Chinese:
除了溫柔的語言，有時候也得用拳頭來傳達愛情──
這就是我們姊妹……不，是頑固獸一派的愛喔！
Korean:
상냥한 말, 그리고 때로는 주먹을 나누며 사랑을 전한다――
그것이 우리 자매의… 아니, 간쿠몬 일문의 사랑의 형태야!
German:
Nette Worte und ab und zu ein Hieb ...
So zeigen wir in Gankoomons Familie unsere Liebe!

English: Zzzz... Noir...
Chinese: 啊嗯啊嗯……姊姊…………
German: Zzzz ... Ciel ...

English:
I've never seen anything quite like it, but it's
clear you love each other.
Chinese:
呵呵……雖然不太懂，
但妳們姊妹真的感情很好呢。
Korean:
후후… 잘은 모르겠지만
정말로 자매끼리 사이가 좋구나
German:
So was habe ich noch nie gesehen, aber es ist
eindeutig, dass ihr euch lieb habt.

English:
We wouldn't want to wake her.
I think it's time to go, Agumon, Gabumon.
Chinese:
為了不吵醒她，我們就趁現在回去吧，
亞古獸、加布獸。
Korean:
깨우지 않도록 이 틈에 얼른 돌아가자.
아구몬, 파피몬
German:
Wir sollten sie nicht wecken.
Es wird Zeit, dass wir gehen, Agumon, Gabumon.

English: This is an excellent training gym!
Chinese: 這裡真是最棒的訓練健身房了！
German: Dies ist ein fabelhaftes Trainingsstudio!

English:
Thanks for everything! Noir, Blanc, and...erm...
masked man!
Chinese:
今天真是謝謝你們！
漆黑師傅、雪白師傅、還有……面具男！
EnglishCensored:
Thanks for everything! Ciel, Blanc, and...erm...
masked man!
Korean:
오늘은 고마웠어!
느와르 사부, 블랑 사부, 그리고 어…… 가면남!
German:
Danke für alles! Ciel, Blanc und ... äh ...
maskierter Mann!

English: Thanks!
Chinese: 謝謝你們──！
German: Danke!

English: Hehe... She said we're excellent!
Chinese: 呵呵……她說最棒呢！
German: Hehe ... Sie hat gesagt, dass wir fabelhaft sind!

English:
You're partly to thank. You may look ordinary,
but you're anything but!
Chinese:
這也是多虧了你對她的幫忙喔。
不過是個大眾臉……很行嘛！
Korean:
이것도 네가 그녀에게 힘을 빌려준 덕분이야.
평범한 얼굴 주제에… 제법이잖아!
German:
Dafür müssen wir dir auch danken. Du wirkst
so gewöhnlich, bist aber das Gegenteil!

English: We'll hire you again next time!
Chinese: 要是再有機會的話，就拜託你來幫忙啦！
German: Nächstes Mal heuern wir dich wieder an!

English: I can...still fight... Zzzz...
Chinese: 我還能戰鬥～……啊嗯啊嗯。
German: Ich kann ... noch kämpfen ... Zzzz ...

English:
Oh my, she's even fighting in her dreams!
What am I going to do with her? Hehehe.
Chinese:
真是的，這孩子居然在夢裡也要戰鬥啊！
真是欠人照顧的妹妹呢……呵呵。
Korean:
이런이런, 이 애는 꿈 속에서도 싸우고 있네!
정말이지, 손이 가는 동생이야… 후후
German:
Wow, sie kämpft sogar, während sie träumt!
Was soll ich nur mit ihr machen? Hihihi.
